title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
intro: This page explains our order cancellation, returns, and refund process. We aim for a fast and fair resolution for all valid requests.

sections.heading: 1. Order Cancellation
content: You may cancel an order before it is shipped. Once an item has been dispatched, cancellation is not possible through the website.
To request a cancellation, contact our support team with your order ID as soon as possible.

sections.heading: 2. Returns & Eligibility
content: Return requests must be submitted within 7 days of delivery, unless the product page states otherwise.
Items must be unused, in original condition, and returned with all tags and packaging.
Certain products (perishable goods, personalized items, intimate apparel) may not be eligible for return — check the product page for exceptions.

sections.heading: 3. Refund Processing
content: Once we receive and inspect the returned item, eligible refunds will be processed within 5–7 business days.
Refunds will be issued to the original payment method. The time taken for the refund to reflect in your account depends on the payment provider or bank.

sections.heading: 4. Exchange & Replacement
content: If you received a defective or incorrect item, we will arrange an exchange or replacement at no extra cost where possible.
Contact support within 48 hours of delivery and provide photos and order details to speed up the process.

sections.heading: 5. Return Shipping & Charges
content: Return shipping costs are borne by the customer unless the return is due to our error (wrong/defective item).
If we authorize a return pickup, we will provide instructions on packaging and drop-off.

sections.heading: 6. Non-Refundable Items & Fees
content: Shipping fees and convenience charges are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error.
Products returned in a condition that prevents resale (used, damaged, missing parts) may be refused or subject to a restocking fee.

sections.heading: 7. How to Initiate a Return
content: Contact our support team with order ID, reason for return, and photos (if applicable).
Support will verify eligibility and provide an RMA/return label and instructions where applicable.
